title: Russia Broadens Push to Relocate Civilians as Battle for Kherson Looms
description: The Ukrainian military said occupation officials were forcing people from their homes in Kherson, ahead of a possible battle for control of the key region.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:credit: Finbarr O'Reilly for The New York Times
media:description: Ukrainian forces firing a Grad rocket launcher outside Mykolaiv, in southern Ukraine, on Monday.
